text: "Friends" is a 1971 song by Elton John and is the title track to the 1971 movie Friends. It was included on the soundtrack album. It went to number 34 in the United States, number 13 in Canada, number 19 in New Zealand, number 96 in Australia, number 12 in France and number 5 in Italy. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Pop songs
title: Friends (Elton John song)
